Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatabaseIndex<READER extends IndexReader>
    Lucene index that may consist of one or multiple separate lucene indexes that are represented as independent partitions.
    LuceneIndexConsistencyCheckVisitor  
    SearcherReference  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX extends AbstractLuceneIndex<READER>,​READER extends IndexReader>
    This class collects the common features of ReadOnlyAbstractDatabaseIndex and WritableAbstractDatabaseIndex.
    AbstractLuceneIndex<READER extends IndexReader>
    Abstract implementation of a partitioned index.
    AbstractLuceneIndexAccessor<READER extends IndexReader,​INDEX extends DatabaseIndex<READER>>  
    DroppableIndex<READER extends IndexReader>
    A droppable index is the same as a read-only index, except it can also be dropped.
    DroppableLuceneIndex<READER extends IndexReader>  
    IndexWriterConfigs
    Helper factory for standard lucene index writer configuration.
    LuceneAllDocumentsReader  
    LuceneMinimalIndexAccessor<READER extends IndexReader>  
    LucenePartitionAllDocumentsReader
    Provides a view of all Documents in a single partition.
    ReadOnlyAbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX extends AbstractLuceneIndex<READER>,​READER extends IndexReader>
    Read only lucene index representation that wraps provided index implementation and allow read only operations only on top of it.
    WritableAbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX extends AbstractLuceneIndex<READER>,​READER extends IndexReader>
    Writable lucene index representation that wraps provided index implementation and allow read only operations only on top of it.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LuceneDocumentRetrievalException
    Exception that will be thrown in case if encounter IOException during Lucene document retrieval.
